<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/scalartax/products/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This API endpoint is used to update the details of a specific product for a tenant.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"product":{"type":"object","properties":{"products":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"product_code":{"type":"string","description":"Unique identifier for the product"},"product_group":{"type":"string","description":"Category of the product (e.g., Electronics, Accessories)"},"category":{"type":"string","description":"Subcategory of the product (e.g., Laptop, Mouse)"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed description of the product"},"tax_code":{"type":"string","description":"Tax code associated with the product"},"entity_id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique identifier for the entity the product belongs to"},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created the product (nullable)"},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who last updated the product (nullable)"},"product_attributes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"attribute_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the product attribute (e.g., Color, Battery Life)"},"attribute_value":{"type":"string","description":"Value of the product attribute (e.g., Black, 1.5 Years)"},"attribute_unit_of_measure":{"type":"string","description":"Unit of measurement for the attribute (nullable)"}},"required":["attribute_name","attribute_value","attribute_unit_of_measure"]}}},"required":["product_code","product_group","category","description","tax_code","entity_id","product_attributes"]}}}}},"title":"Product1"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
